In England, in the seven days to 13 March, there were 373,217 new confirmed cases (660.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 March, there were 223,237 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 67% (149,980 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 March is 16,928,787 (29,935.9 cases per 100,000 population).
